item.title: Protests erupt in Syria over Christmas tree burning
item.description: Thousands of Christians protest to urge Syria's new Islamist leadership to protect minorities.

item.title: Russian ship under US sanctions sinks after engine room blast
item.description: Ursa Major ran into trouble in the Mediterranean between Spain and Algeria, with two crew still missing.

item.title: Actor Baldoni women's solidarity award rescinded amid allegations
item.description: Justin Baldoni was accused by Blake Lively of sexual harassment and a campaign to wreck her reputation.

item.title: Fireworks explode as US house burns down
item.description: No injuries were reported from the fire but two homes were destroyed, firefighters say.

item.title: Twelve dead in Turkey ammunition factory blast
item.description: Officials are investigating the cause of the accident that engulfed part of the building in fire.
